data.summary: MSSQL、MySQL、PostgreSQL、SQLite、Oracle、MongoDB、Redis、Elasticsearch、memcache 主流数据库和 NoSQL 的 Rust 客户端驱动程序一网打尽
data.introduction:
MSSQL、MySQL、PostgreSQL、SQLite、Oracle、MongoDB、Redis、Elasticsearch、memcache 主流数据库和 NoSQL 的 Rust 客户端驱动程序一网打尽。


MSSQL

又名 Microsoft SQL Server，支持它的 Rust 驱动程序开源地址：


  • prisma/tiberius: TDS 7.2+ (mssql / Microsoft SQL Server) async driver for rust

支持的版本有 2019、2017、2016、2014、2012、2008、2005


MySQL

  • AgilData/mysql-proxy-rs: A highly scalable MySQL Proxy framework written in Rust
  • blackbeam/mysql_async: Asyncronous Rust Mysql driver based on Tokio.
  • blackbeam/rust-mysql-simple: Mysql client library implemented in rust.
  • launchbadge/sqlx: 🧰 The Rust SQL Toolkit. An async, pure Rust SQL crate featuring compile-time checked queries without a DSL. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite.


PostgreSQL

  • sfackler/rust-postgres: Native PostgreSQL driver for the Rust programming language


SQLite

  • rusqlite/rusqlite: Ergonomic bindings to SQLite for Rust


Oracle

  • kubo/rust-oracle: Oracle driver for Rust


MongoDB

  • mongodb/mongo-rust-driver: The official MongoDB Rust Driver


Redis

  • mitsuhiko/redis-rs: Redis library for rust


Elasticsearch

  • elastic-rs/elastic: An Elasticsearch REST API client for Rust
  • benashford/rs-es: A Rust client for the ElasticSearch REST API


memcache

  • aisk/rust-memcache: memcache client for rust
  • jaysonsantos/bmemcached-rs: Rust binary memcached implementation


参考链接：https://learnku.com/articles/46056
